commit.message:
Rollup merge of #75010 - Aaron1011:feature/remove-old-deps, r=Mark-Simulacrum

Update elasticlunr-rs and ammonia transitive deps

This removes all dependencies on pre-1.0 proc-macro ecosystem crates
(syn, quote, and proc-macro2)

verification.payload:
tree e38a01104dd93874217f76039bb2c27b63dd99a3
parent 7d18040b0c2199f448630909dfc7c7621610b742
parent 70ba491b7823c17887c6e29184f5af3f725578a3
author Yuki Okushi <huyuumi.dev@gmail.com> 1596384322 +0900
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1596384322 +0900

Rollup merge of #75010 - Aaron1011:feature/remove-old-deps, r=Mark-Simulacrum

Update elasticlunr-rs and ammonia transitive deps

This removes all dependencies on pre-1.0 proc-macro ecosystem crates
(syn, quote, and proc-macro2)
